This ticket came for you.

It says you got it for speeding
 on the provincial road from Cassino to Sabaudia.

Enrico.

Enrico.
 Này.

I swear, I didn't mean to!
 She told me she was sick of being scared.

en: Ma se quando io sbrocco, tu sai che io faccio così,

en: per quale cazzo di motivo non stai al tuo posto?

pa: Am I wrong?

pa: Get off!

Không…

pa: I just squeezed.

pa: Then she stopped moving.

pa: Mom, do you trust me?

en: Tanto puoi stare quanto vuoi. Oppure mi raggiungi.

You're welcome to stay as long as you want.
 And we could hang out more.

pa: I don't know, I'll think about it.
vi: Tớ không biết. Để xem.

pa: He took the provincial road.

pa: He was lying to us all.

Hey Van. Call me as soon as you get this.
